item.title: Unlocking a Caddx Alarm
item.description: I woke up one day with the thought “Gee, it would be nice to have my house alarm send notifications”…. which seems like a simple enough idea in theory. Unfortunately the Alarm industry has other ideas. It’s 2019. I have wifi enabled light bulbs I can control with my phone… yet my home alarm system still doesn’t have TCP/IP connectivity. Surely newer models are better? maybe with a nice REST api?

item.title: Hills alarm notifications are a trip to hell
item.description: TLDR; I have alarm notifications set up on a linux box. My home alarm is from a time when an alert meant “dial a security company”. Having email alerts instead makes sense…. at least to me. Unfortunately the Alarm industry has other ideas. IoT has exploded. I have wifi enabled light bulbs I can control with my phone… yet my home alarm system still doesn’t have TCP/IP connectivity. Surely newer models include a web interface?
